name: Carroll
description:
The Facebook page of a dead person is the creepiest thing in the world. Does it apply to a blog as well? Find out with the assistance of your favorite blogger, who just committed suicide!

Find the last message she left for her fans and have fun!

Created for Darktober 2017 Game Jam by:

BlackTea as lead programmer,

Yuwrenn as artist and assistant programmer,

Christopher Robayna as music and sound effect artist
